definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: The autocorrelation function is an even function .
sentences.chinese: 自相關函數是一個偶函數。

sentences.english: This paper explores the odd function and even function's property of infinite integral.
sentences.chinese: 探討奇函數和偶函數在無限區間上的積分問題。
